dct_title_s: A new & accurate map of the North Pole : with all the countries hitherto discovered situated near or adjacent to it as well as some others more remote. Drawn from the latest and best authorities and regulated by astronoml. observatns.
dct_description_sm: Map of the North Pole and surrounding countries, with relief shown pictorially.   Prime meridian: London.   Plate 70 from: A complete atlas, or, Distinct view of the known world / by Emanuel Bowen. London : Printed for William Innys and Joseph Richardson [and others], 1752.
dct_publisher_sm: Printed for William Innys and Joseph Richardson ... et al. (London)
